attributes.action: Honour the musical exploits and charitable works of RP "Frampton" Smythe The Earl  Of Cranford.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RP as he is known to his devotees is the UK's (probably the worlds) leading "air guitarist" although famous for his musical exploits he has long worked tirelessly in the 3rd sector and recognition for all of his works is long overdue.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
